refnamediv.refpurpose: Cross correlation between a vectorial signal and a given shape

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: [sim, out] = ld_vecXCorrelation(sim, events, in, shape, vecsize)

para.para: shape - vector to compare the input with
Calculates the cross correlation between "in" and "shape"
The size of the output vector signal will be vecsize-length(shape) + 1
